data.what_is: We are passionate for Marketing Automation. We know Marketing Automation add tremendous value in overall marketing of your business. Its a must-have tool for every efficient Small business.
data.product_description: We are passionate for Marketing Automation. We know Marketing Automation add tremendous value in overall marketing of your business. Its a must-have tool for every efficient Small business.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketic?
your  strategies development, the use of digital marketing tools in order to generate leads to help the sales area to achieve or exceed business objectives.

What do you dislike about Marketic?
So far I have not have any problems with it

Recommendations to others considering Marketic:
No recommendations

What problems is Marketic solving and how is that benefiting you?
The company has had a greater reach to more people within the country to be able to obtain our services.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good agency for helping in lead generation for services
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marketic?
The team at Marketic is helpful and knows what they're doing. We loved the platform that assisted in our lead generation process. Our primary motivation for trying Marketic was its integration with Hubspot that comes in really handy when looking to automate lead generation process.

What do you dislike about Marketic?
The tool is still a work in progress but the good thing is that there are regular updates coming in that will make it a better tool than it is already. Hoping this lack of features gets fixed with time.

What problems is Marketic solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've used Marketc to figure out our marketing automation systems. The marketic platform helps execute marketing campaigns that get pushed right into hubspot marketing hub which creates a good pipeline for business process management.
